channel.title: Solanum bulbocastanum on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Solanum bulbocastanum on funPlantGenes

item.title: Rpi-blb2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Rpi-blb2 Gene Name: blight resistance protein Rpi-blb2 Genome: Species: Solanum bulbocastanum Functional Descriptions: The Rpi-blb2 gene from Solanum bulbocastanum is an Mi-1 gene homolog conferring broad-spectrum late blight resistance in potato.
